crown.name: CSK_FlowConfig_FeatureBlocks
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: FeatureBlocks_FC
crown.desc: Crown to provide CSK_FlowConfig relevant features.

crown.name: JSON
crown.desc: Set source events of incoming data to create JSON content.

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: json
function.desc: Set source events of incoming data to create JSON content.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc: Optional source of trigger event to create JSON file. If not used, it will push JSON content with every single value update.
param.name: trigger

crown.name: CollectData
crown.desc: Collect data multiple times to forward it in a single event.

param.desc: Maximum counter value of received data before forwarding it.
param.name: counter

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: collectData
function.desc: Collect data multiple times to forward it in a single event.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc: Optional source of trigger event to forward collected data. If not used, it will push the collected data after it received data >= counter.
param.name: trigger

param.desc:
Source of data to collect.
Parameter: 1: Data (STRING)
param.name: source

crown.name: Log
crown.desc: Debug blog to log received content.

param.desc: Set log level to forwarded value.
param.name: Level

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: log
function.desc: Set source events of incoming data to create JSON content.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

crown.name: CSK_FlowConfigFeatureBlocks
crown.desc: SensorApp to provide features as blocks for the CSK FlowConfig feature. + Run this application in parallel to the CSK_Module_FlowConfig. Features provided by this SensorApp will be shown as blocks within the CSK_Module_FlowConfig UI. + Regarding further information, please read the CSK documentation provided on https://github.com/SICKAppSpaceCodingStarterKit.

event.name: OnNewJSON_ID
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to notify created JSON content. + ID will be replaced by an internal created identifier (e.g. "OnNewJSON_3"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event exists.

event.name: OnNewCollectedData_ID
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to notify collected data content. + ID will be replaced by an internal created identifier (e.g. "OnNewCollectedData_3"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event exists.

function.name: addJSONBlock
function.desc: Function to add / extend a FlowConfig block to create JSON content out of received data.

param.desc: Optional event name to trigger creation of JSON content.
param.name: trigger

function.name: addDataCollectorBlock
function.desc: Function to add / extend a FlowConfig block to collect data.

param.desc: Maximum value of counter to collect data before forwarding them.
param.name: counter

param.desc: Optional event name to forward data collected so far.
param.name: trigger

function.name: addLogBlock
function.desc: Function to add a new logger.
